message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
public class Department {
    String dept;
    List<Employee> employees;
    double minSal;
    double maxSal;
    
    public void addEmployee(Employee emp){
        maxSal = 0.0;
        minSal = Double.MAX_VALUE; // initialize minSal with the maximum possible value
        
        if (maxSal < emp.getSalary()) {
            maxSal = emp.getSalary();
        }
        
        if (minSal > emp.getSalary()) {
            minSal = emp.getSalary();
        }
    }
}
<<<explanation>>>: To find the minimum salary, you can initialize the minSal variable with the maximum possible value (Double.MAX_VALUE) and then compare it with each employee's salary. If the employee's salary is smaller than the current minSal, update minSal with the employee's salary. This way, you will find the minimum salary among all employees in the department.
